item.description:
We're deep into the summer, and what better way to spend it than by lazily tubing down a river!  So pull out those swim trunks, splash on the sunscreen, get those swimmies around your upper arms, it's time to go tubing down the Farmington River!

Here are the particulars in brevity:

Cost ... $20 / person (another $10 to go again!) ... MUST BRING CASH!  CASH ONLY!
Cost includes ... Tube, PFD, and a bus ride back to the put-in from the take-out
Details ... 2-3 mile trip downstream, 1-2 hrs to complete based on river speed
What should you bring? ... http://www.farmingtonrivertubing.com/inform...
Rules ... http://www.farmingtonrivertubing.com/rules....
 

If it rains, we'll have a make-up date at some point in the future.

The Plan:

We will carpool from the Burlington Coat Factory in Johnston, RI and depart immediately at 10 am.  We'll head out on Route 6 for a two-hour drive and arrive at the tubing facilities around noon.  Plan to head back and be home by 5 pm.
item.how_to_find_us: Just keep tuned to the event page ...
item.name: Tubing down the Farmington River
